name: Building Escapes
description:
Building Escape is a First Person Game Build In Unreal Engine as a Prototype Game . It is a Puzzle Game where players are Thrown in a Prison and have to find their way out. It was Build within two weeks with no prior knowledge of Unreal Engine Blueprint System.

Game-Play
  • Game Contains 3 rooms Separated By Locked Doors
  • Each Locked Door Can be Opened By a Specific Battery On a Specific Battery Stand
  • Idea Is That each Door is powered by a specific battery
  • Final Room Is Locked By Three Consecutive Door Which will create the Puzzle Element of the Game
